    • Method Detail

      • getNavigator

        public static Navigation getNavigator()
        Get instance of the Navigation class. Only allows one thread at a time calling this method.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Method that stops the robot completely.

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
            double y)
        This method causes the robot to travel to the absolute field location (x, y), specified in tile points. This method should continuously call turnTo(double theta) and then set the motor speed to forward (straight). This will make sure that your heading is updated until you reach your exact goal. This method will poll the odometer for information.
        Parameters:
        x: - destination x coordinates
        y: - destination y coordinates

      • isNavigating

        public boolean isNavigating()
        This method returns true if another thread has called travelTo() or turnTo() and the method has yet to return; false otherwise.

      • navigateForward

        public void navigateForward(double distance)
        This method causes the robot to navigate forward for a set amount of distance.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(double theta)
        This method causes the robot to turn (on point) to the absolute heading theta. This method should turn using the MINIMAL angle to its target.

      • turnTo2

        public void turnTo2(double theta)
        Method that causes the robot to turn to an exact angle with respect to the Y axis.
        Parameters:
        theta -

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double theta)
        Method that rotates continuously (without waiting for the move to complete) according to the input theta.
        Parameters:
        theta - that is the angle at which the robot needs to turn

      • isTraveling

        public boolean isTraveling()
        Getters method for traveling.
        Returns:
        traveling

      • setTraveling

        Setter method for traveling.
        Parameters:
        traveling -
